full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement
#### Request for Proposal: Soft Body Armour Vests
---

**Contract Details**

*   Reference Number: PW-__PR-751-81435
*   Amendment Number: 1
*   Solicitation Number: K0A70-220330/A
*   Amendment Date: 2022-11-21
*   Contracting Entity: Public Works and Government Services Canada

**Tender Summary**

Trade Agreement: Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)/ World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA) / Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP) / Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)

*   Requirement: The Government of Canada’s Environment and Climate Change (ECCC) has a requirement for Soft Body Armour Vests to be supplied in accordance with the specification.
*   Deliverables: Goods will be delivered on an "AS & WHEN" requested basis according to the requirements outlined in the Request for Proposal.
*   Estimated Usage: The estimated quantities required for each year of the contract are:
    *   Year 1 – 85 units
    *   Year 2 – 85 units
    *   Year 3 – 85 units
    *   Year 4 (if extended) – 100 units
    *   Year 5 (if extended) – 100 units

**Procurement Information**

*   Tendering Procedures: All interested suppliers may submit a bid.
*   Competitive Procurement Strategy: Best Overall Proposal
*   Comprehensive Land Claim Agreement: No

**Submission Guidelines**

*   Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.
*   Enquiries regarding the Request for Proposal must be submitted in writing and received by the Contracting Authority at least 7 calendar days prior to the bid closing date. Please email: catherine.dore@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
*   **Bid Closing Date:** 2022-12-13T14:00:00

**Attachments**

*   Please see the attached documents for further information:
    *   https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/18/cecf3acb30230e0c8ffc9e4c6d76409f/ABES.PROD.PW__PR.B751.E81435.EBSU002.PDF
    *   https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents
